TextView.android:text: 3-5x 30kg Muscle Ups
x3 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 10kg Muscle Ups ---> 10 Muscle Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 3 seconds Planche Hold ---> 5 seconds Front Lever Hold ---> 5 seconds Back Lever Hold (All moves to be performed consecutively)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 seconds V-Sit Hold ---> 5x 90 Degree Handstand Push Ups
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3-5x 160kg Squats
x5 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 120kg Squats
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 100kg Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Glute Ham Raises with 15kg
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3-5x 100kg Dips
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
4x Ring L-Sit Muscle Ups with 10kg
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 70kg Dips (On the last rep, pause at the bottom for 7 seconds)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 90 Degree Handstand Push Ups (with 10kg weighted vest)
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
3-5x 70kg Pull Ups
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
2x 10kg One Arm Pull Ups (E/S)
x3 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Front Lever Pull Ups (with 10kg weighted vest) ---> 5-7x 10kg Muscle Ups ---> 5 seconds Front Lever Hold (with 10kg weighted vest)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
30 Pull Ups ---> 5 Muscle Ups
x4 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)

x2 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)

x2 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)

x2 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)

x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)

x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)

x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)

x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
End of Advanced Program Level 5 - Week 3
